info.title: FSH.Starter.WebApi
info.description: .NET 9 Starter Kit with Vertical Slice Architecture!

post.description: Approve a reconciled account reconciliation
Create a new account reconciliation comparing GL balance with subsidiary ledger

delete.description: Delete an account reconciliation (only if not approved)

get.description: Get account reconciliation details by ID

put.description: Update reconciliation balances and metadata

post.description: Run account reconciliation for a chart of account and its reconciliation lines
Search and filter account reconciliations with pagination and filtering support
Closes an accounting period
create accounting period

delete.description: delete accounting period by id

put.description: update accounting period

post.description: Reopens a previously closed accounting period
search accounting periods

delete.description: Deletes an accounts payable account (only if balance is zero)

put.description: Updates an existing accounts payable account

post.description: Reconciles AP control account with subsidiary vendor ledgers
Records a missed early payment discount opportunity for an AP account
Records a payment to vendors and tracks early payment discounts

put.description: Updates the aging buckets and calculates total balance

post.description: Reconciles AR control account with subsidiary customer ledgers
Records a collection (payment received) for an AR account and updates YTD statistics
Records a bad debt write-off for an AR account and updates bad debt statistics

put.description: Updates the allowance for uncollectible receivables
Updates the aging buckets and calculates total balance

post.description: Creates a new accrual entry

get.description: Gets the details of an accrual by its ID

put.description: Updates an accrual's mutable fields

delete.description: Deletes an accrual entry by its identifier

post.description: Search accrual entries with filters and pagination
Approves accrual entry
Rejects accrual entry

put.description: Reverses an accrual entry by ID

post.summary: Creates a new agent banking location

get.summary: Gets an agent banking location by ID

post.summary: Credits float to an agent's account
Debits float from an agent's account
Records an audit for an agent
Searches agent banking locations with filters and pagination
Confirm AML alert as suspicious activity
File Suspicious Activity Report (SAR) for AML alert
Search AML alerts with filters and pagination
Approve the current level of an approval request

post.description: Records employee attendance for a specific date

get.description: Retrieves attendance details

put.description: Updates attendance information

delete.description: Deletes an attendance record

post.description: Searches attendance records with pagination and filters
Generates an attendance report based on specified criteria and report type

get.description: Retrieves an attendance report by ID with all details

post.description: Searches and filters attendance reports with pagination support

get.description: Downloads an attendance report in specified format (PDF/Excel)

post.description: Exports an attendance report in specified format
Creates a new bank account for an employee for direct deposit. Account numbers are encrypted at rest.

get.summary: Gets a bank account by ID
get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific bank account. Account numbers are masked for security.

put.description: Updates bank account details. Account numbers are encrypted at rest.

delete.description: Deletes a bank account. Cannot delete if it's the primary account.

post.description: Searches and filters bank accounts by employee, bank name, account type with pagination support. Account numbers are masked for security.
Approve a completed bank reconciliation, marking it as final and verified. Only reconciliations with Completed status can be approved. Sets IsReconciled to true.
Mark a bank reconciliation as completed. Verifies that the adjusted book balance equals the statement balance (within tolerance). Records who completed the reconciliation for audit purposes.
Create a new bank reconciliation with opening balances from bank statement and general ledger. Reconciliation starts in Pending status and moves through InProgress, Completed, and Approved statuses.

delete.description: Delete a bank reconciliation. Only reconciliations that are not yet reconciled and approved can be deleted. This permanently removes the reconciliation record.

get.description: Retrieve a specific bank reconciliation with all its details including status, balances, adjustments, and audit information.

put.description: Update outstanding checks, deposits in transit, and error adjustments for an in-progress reconciliation. Calculates adjusted book balance which must eventually match the statement balance.

post.description: Reject a completed bank reconciliation and return it to Pending status for rework. The rejection reason is recorded in the reconciliation notes for reference.
Search and filter bank reconciliations by bank account, date range, status, and reconciliation state. Supports pagination. Results are ordered by reconciliation date (most recent first).
Transition a bank reconciliation from Pending to InProgress status. Once started, the user can begin entering reconciliation items such as outstanding checks and deposits in transit.
Creates a new bank in the accounting system with comprehensive validation and returns the created bank ID.

get.description: Retrieves a bank by its unique identifier with all details.

put.description: Updates an existing bank in the accounting system with comprehensive validation.

delete.description: Deletes a bank from the accounting system. Consider deactivating instead of deleting to preserve historical data.

post.description: Searches banks with filtering by bank code, name, routing number, SWIFT code, and active status. Supports pagination and sorting.
Creates a new benefit allocation for an employee. Allocates specific benefit amounts with optional HR approval.

get.summary: Gets a benefit allocation by ID
get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific benefit allocation including amount, status, and approval details.

post.description: Searches and filters benefit allocations by employee, benefit, status, year with pagination support.
Approves a pending benefit allocation. Activates the allocation for the employee.
Rejects a pending benefit allocation. Marks as rejected with optional reason.
Creates a new benefit enrollment for an employee. Requires approval from HR.

get.summary: Gets a benefit enrollment by ID
get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific benefit enrollment including status and approval details.

put.description: Updates a benefit enrollment. Limited updates allowed depending on approval status.

post.description: Searches and filters benefit enrollments by employee, benefit, status with pagination support.
Terminates an active benefit enrollment, effective immediately or on a specified date.
Creates a new benefit offering (mandatory or optional) with contribution details per Philippines Labor Code.

get.description: Retrieves detailed information for the specified benefit including contributions, coverage, and effective dates.

put.description: Updates benefit contribution, coverage, activation status, and description.

delete.description: Deletes a benefit from the catalog.

post.description: Search benefit catalog by type, mandatory flag, and active status with pagination.

post.summary: Add a line item to a bill
post.description: Adds a new line item to an existing bill and recalculates the total.

get.summary: Get all line items for a bill
get.description: Retrieves all line items for a specific bill.

get.summary: Get bill line item by ID
get.description: Retrieves a specific line item by its identifier.

put.description: Updates an existing line item and recalculates the bill total.

delete.description: Deletes a line item and recalculates the bill total.

post.description: Creates an invoice for a consumption record
Creates a new bill in the accounts payable system with comprehensive validation.

get.description: Retrieves a bill with all line items.

put.description: Updates an existing bill in the accounts payable system with validation.

delete.description: Deletes a draft bill. Cannot delete posted or paid bills.

post.description: Search and filter bills with pagination.
Approves a bill for payment processing. The approver is automatically determined from the current user session.

put.description: Rejects a bill with a reason.
Posts an approved bill to the general ledger.
Marks a bill as paid with the payment date.
Voids a bill with a reason.

Activates a chart of account

post.summary: Import chart of accounts from Excel file
post.description: Imports chart of accounts from an Excel (.xlsx) file with validation and duplicate checking

post.summary: Export chart of accounts to Excel file
post.description: Exports chart of accounts to Excel (.xlsx) file with optional filtering by account type, USOA category, and search criteria

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific check including current status, payment details, and complete audit trail.

put.description: Updates an existing check in the accounting system. BankAccountName and BankName are automatically populated from their respective entities based on the provided BankAccountCode and BankId.

post.description: Search and filter checks with pagination, status filtering, date ranges, and amount ranges. Supports advanced filtering by check number, bank account, payee name, and print/stop payment status.
Register a new check in the system for later use in payments. Creates a check in 'Available' status.
Issue a check to a payee/vendor for payment of expenses, invoices, or other obligations. Transitions check to Issued status.
Void a check that was issued in error or needs to be cancelled. Records the void reason in audit trail.
Mark a check as cleared during bank reconciliation when it appears on the bank statement.
Request stop payment on a check that is lost, stolen, or needs to be cancelled before presentation to the bank.
Mark a check as printed and record who performed the printing. Maintains audit trail for compliance.

Rejects a previously approved inventory transaction, optionally recording the reason for rejection.

delete.description: Deletes an invoice. Only Draft or Cancelled invoices can be deleted.

post.description: Search and filter invoices with pagination.
Transitions invoice status from Draft to Sent.
Marks an invoice as fully paid with payment details.
Applies a partial payment to an invoice. Automatically marks as paid when total payments meet invoice amount.
Cancels an unpaid invoice with an optional reason.
Voids an invoice to reverse accounting impact while maintaining audit trail.
Adds a new line item to an invoice and updates the total amount.

get.description: Retrieves all line items associated with a specific invoice.

put.description: Updates an existing invoice line item and recalculates totals.

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific item-supplier relationship

post.description: Search and filter item-supplier relationships with pagination support

put.description: Updates an existing inventory item

delete.description: Deletes an inventory item

Imports items from an Excel file with validation. Returns ImportResponse with successful/failed counts and detailed error messages.
Exports items to Excel format with optional filtering by category, supplier, price range, and other criteria. Returns an ExportResponse with file data.

get.summary: Get comprehensive dashboard analytics for a specific item
get.description: Returns detailed performance metrics including sales trends, stock levels, movement classification, and supplier performance for the specified item.

post.description: Approve a pending journal entry. Approved entries can then be posted to the general ledger. The approver is automatically determined from the current user session.
Create a new journal entry with balanced debit and credit lines for double-entry accounting.

delete.description: Delete a journal entry that has not been posted. Posted entries cannot be deleted - use reverse instead.

get.description: Retrieve a specific journal entry by its identifier

put.description: Update the details of an unposted journal entry. Posted entries cannot be modified - use reverse instead.

post.summary: Post a journal entry to the general ledger
post.description: Post a balanced journal entry to the general ledger. The entry must be balanced (debits = credits) and cannot be modified after posting.
Reject a pending journal entry. Rejected entries cannot be posted and may require correction.
Create a reversing entry with opposite debit/credit amounts to correct a posted journal entry.
Searches journal entries with pagination and filtering support
creates a new journal entry line

delete.description: deletes journal entry line

get.summary: get journal entry line by id
get.description: gets journal entry line by id

put.description: updates journal entry line

get.summary: list journal entry lines by journal entry id
get.description: retrieves all journal entry lines for a specific journal entry

post.description: Creates a new leave balance for an employee for a specific leave type and year with opening balance

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific leave balance including opening, used, and remaining days

put.description: Updates leave balance opening balance or other details

delete.description: Removes a leave balance from the system

post.description: Searches and filters leave balances by employee, leave type, year with pagination support
Adds accrued leave amount to a leave balance based on accrual frequency
Generates a leave report based on specified criteria and report type

get.description: Retrieves a leave report by ID with all details

post.description: Searches and filters leave reports with pagination support

get.description: Downloads a leave report in specified format (PDF/Excel)

post.description: Exports a leave report in specified format

Creates a new leave request for an employee. The request is created in Draft status and must be submitted for approval. Validates employee leave balance and leave type eligibility per Philippines Labor Code.

get.summary: Gets a leave request by ID
get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific leave request including status, dates, approval details, and attachments

put.description: Updates a leave request including status and approver comments. Primarily used for administrative updates.

delete.description: Deletes a leave request. Only Draft and Rejected requests can be deleted. Approved or Submitted requests cannot be deleted without proper workflow steps.

post.description: Searches and filters leave requests by employee, leave type, status, and date range with pagination support. Supports advanced filtering per Philippines Labor Code compliance requirements.

post.summary: Submits a leave request for approval
post.description: Submits a Draft leave request for manager approval. Validates leave balance and eligibility per Philippines Labor Code. Request transitions to Submitted status.
Approves a Submitted leave request. Manager can include optional comments. Request transitions to Approved status and leave balance is updated per Philippines Labor Code.
Rejects a Submitted leave request with a required reason. Request transitions to Rejected status and reserved pending balance is released per Philippines Labor Code.
Cancels a Draft or Submitted leave request by the employee. Approved requests cannot be cancelled. Reserved pending balance is released per Philippines Labor Code.
Creates a new leave type with Philippines Labor Code compliance including classification, accrual frequency, and approval requirements

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific leave type including accrual rules and approval requirements

put.description: Updates leave type information including accrual allowance, frequency, and approval requirements

delete.description: Removes a leave type from the system

post.description: Searches and filters leave types with pagination support

post.summary: Search legal actions with filters and pagination

get.summary: Gets a loan application by ID

post.summary: Submits a loan application for review
Assigns the application to a loan officer
Completes review of the loan application
Approves a loan application with terms
Withdraws a loan application by the applicant
Returns a loan application to the applicant for corrections

Gets all collaterals for a loan

put.summary: Updates the valuation of a loan collateral

post.summary: Create a new loan disbursement tranche

get.summary: Get loan disbursement tranche by ID
Gets a loan guarantor by ID

put.summary: Updates the guaranteed amount for a loan guarantor

post.description: Creates a new payroll period for processing employee pay. Payroll is created in Draft status and must be processed before GL posting.

get.summary: Gets a payroll period by ID
get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific payroll period including totals, status, and GL posting details.

put.description: Updates payroll period details such as notes. Locked payrolls cannot be updated.

delete.description: Deletes a payroll period. Only Draft payrolls can be deleted. Processed or posted payrolls cannot be deleted.

post.description: Searches and filters payroll periods by date range, status, and pay frequency with pagination support.
Initiates processing of a Draft payroll period. Calculates pay totals for all lines. Transitions to Processing status.
Completes processing of a payroll period and transitions to Processed status. Ready for GL posting.

post.summary: Posts a payroll to the general ledger
